originalText.text:
This review is way past due yesterday I was reminded of the incredibly difficult time in my life during which I needed legal counsel for a serious criminal matter. Peter Brill came highly recommended and he lived up to the excellent referrals. From our first meeting I trusted that he was the best person to help me with my legal mess.
Without going into specifics I was facing felony charges ( I was innocent of course) and was facing trial to fight the allegations. Peter Brill was nothing short of amazing from the day we met until my acquittal ( thanks to him) almost 2 years later. He's brilliant, compassionate, well respected an all around good guy and great lawyer.
I highly recommend him to anyone in need of an attorney.  He changed my life and helped me through terrible times. Thanks Peter

originalText.text:
We hired Mr.Brill's firm to represent us in an educational related case, to which his website states is one of their specialties. Over the course of almost 2 years, there was no progress made in our case, and the case is still active.

They were fast to take us on as a client, but then communication became next to nothing over the course of our tenure with them. Every 2-3 months we would follow up with case status but there was nothing to report, and we were told to sit tight. After about 2 years (we probably waited too long), we decided to change firms and asked for all correspondence related to the case and the investigator, but Brill's firm could not produce any informative emails or updates with the investigator. Most of the communication was "calls" and "voicemails", but nothing that showed progress or an attempt to bring closure.

Brill’s firm is either too busy (likely) or doesn't care enough (possible) to help with cases deemed “less significant” to them.

In short, 2 years later we're in the same spot we were and our case is still active with 0 progress made on it.

We are currently evaluating new representation. If we could go back, we would have paid the premium (higher cost) for other attorneys who we interviewed with who seemed more invested in our case.

originalText.text: Peter Brill is an incredible attorney who knows law! He is a genius and an incredibly thorough attorney who genuinely cares for his clients and is extremely patient and takes his time to explain everything. He is always reachable and has an incredible staff. A special thank you Mr. Brill and a very special thank you to Maria, who has always gone above and beyond. The Brill Legal group treated me more like family, than just another client. I highly recommend this firm and 5 stars does not properly justify how this firm really is. Thank you for everything!

originalText.text: This Review has been a long time coming. There are no words to express the fact that Mr. Brill save my life. I was facing some serious charges that would have put me away for decades. To say that he fought hard on my behalf would be an understatement. For 2 years he fought for me and won my case against a team of 2 prosecutors and a very hard Judge. His name now carries weight in the Bronx prosecutor's office. They know that if Mr. Brill is on the case, they are going to have a long fight ahead. Everything I have now, I owe to him. It is a debt that I hope one day I will be able to repay.

originalText.text: Peter Brill is one of the upmost professional attorneys that I have worked with. Peter makes time for his clients and is brutally honest. Which I think most people respect as a characteristic (especially when choosing the correct attorney for you). I highly recommend the Brill Firm to assist, help or handle each individuals issue at hand to the fullest extent and in an extremely thorough way. Go Peter!
